Name: Ammo Pigs: Armed and Delicious
About the game: In the future, there is no man. Only machine. And Pig. It's the year 2049. Slaughterhouse A.I. controls the surface of the Earth, turning all life into sausage. Only the pigs remain to fight. Steer your one-pig army through the dangerous hallways of meat factory battlegrounds as you attempt to rescue innocent pigs trapped and waiting for processing. Relive the glory days of 2D platform gaming with this modern action classic.
